intro: Helichrysum benoistii, commonly known as the African frost plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its dense, woolly foliage and bright yellow to orange flowers. The plant is known for its ability to thrive in arid and semi-arid environments, making it a hardy species suitable for xeriscaping. Its compact growth habit and long-lasting flowers make it a popular choice for rock gardens and drought-tolerant landscapes. Helichrysum benoistii also has a historical use in traditional medicine for its purported healing properties.
